Description:
Detects Obfuscated Powershell via Stdin in Scripts

Author: Nikita Nazarov, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Stdin - Security
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '4697' and (servicefilename like '%set%' and servicefilename like '%&&%') and (servicefilename like '%environment%' or servicefilename like '%invoke%' or servicefilename like '%${input)%')
